name: Delirium
description: Woken up in a strange and seemingly abandoned house, you discover what insanity has prevailed as you uncover the remnants of its past guilt-ridden inhabitant.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 HGz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
